pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Procedure to Clean, Decompose and Aggregate Timeseries // Clean, decompose and aggregate univariate time series following the procedure "Cyclic/trend decomposition using bin interpolation" and the Logbox method for flagging outliers, both detailed in Ritter, F.: Technical note: A procedure to clean, decompose, and aggregate time series, Hydrol. Earth Syst. Sci., 27, 349361, doi:10.5194/hess-27-349-2023, 2023.
